name: Running With Scissors (RonMBurgess)
description:
Wreak havoc as you run through the city with scissors! Items:
  • Small Scissors - 100 points
  • Big Scissors - 300 points
Actions
  • Cut People's Clothes - 500 points
Controls - Start Screen
  • Space-bar -  Start Game
  • C - Credits
Controls - Game
  • Spacebar/ Up Arrow / W - Jump
  • Left Mouse Click - Cut Clothes (when in range of people)
  • Down / S - Slide
  • R - Restart
Credits
  • Brian Y - Pixel Art, Design
  • Jacob Sauerhoefer - Game Programming, Music
  • Earl Procko - Pixel Art, Design
  • Corbin P - Audio Engineering , Music
  • Zach Singer - Game Programming, Pixel Art
  • Ron M Burgess - Game Programming

You can also find this game on Zach's Itch.io Profile
